decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The elevations of the buildings shall be painted in RAL 3011, RAL 1013 and RAL 1002 as shown on the approved drawings and shall remain such thereafter.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until the details of the canopies located over the doors and scaled drawings 1:20 of the render treatment in place of the removed pillars and brick arches around the ginnels (if present) shall be submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Client Supporting Statement. Received 13/06/2017
Unnumbered Location Plan. Received 23/06/2017
284 006 C 005. Received 14/12/2017
284 006 C 006 B. Received 31/01/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Application of external wall insulation to 9, 12 Greenwood Road, 8, 13, 18, 20, 21, 23, 37, 47 Howard Road, 11, 17, 22, 25, 32, 33, 35, 38, 40, 49, 50, 56, 64, 73, 81, 83, 91, 97, 99, 105 Morris Road, 72, 80 Octavia Road, 6 Ruskin Road, 3, 5, 6, 12, 23, 37, 39, 44, 52 Unwin Road, 160, 162, 168 Worton Road
